response.original_title: Magic Kingdom Club Gold Card 1993 Update "Be Our Guest"
response.overview: Continuing our look at Walt Disney’s Magic Kingdom Club Gold Card annual update, a Disney Parks update on a VHS Cassette shipped to cardholders nationwide.  The Magic Kingdom Club is celebrating its’ 35th anniversary in 1993 and Lumier starts off by inviting us to sit back, pull up a chair as the Magic Kingdom Club proudly presents Update ’93.  With the opening of the Euro Disney Resort, there are now four destinations spanning the globe and each one invites Magic Kingdom Club members to ‘Be Our Guest” with special benefits and discounts.
response.title: Magic Kingdom Club Gold Card 1993 Update "Be Our Guest"
